title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

Simplification is not required for the first point.

The second point is earned with a correct integral or with work that shows that the integral has been taken. For example, ∫ 1 4 f ( t )  dt , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaaiaadAgacaaMi8 +aaeWaaeaacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caWGKbGa amiDaaWcbaGaaGymaaqaaiaaisdaa0Gaey4kIipakiaacYcaaaa@4185@ or ∫ 1 4 ( − t 2 +5t−4 )  dt , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaamaabmaabaGaey OeI0IaamiDamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaaiwdacaWG 0bGaeyOeI0IaaGinaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiaaykW7caaMc8Uaamizai aadshaaSqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaI0aaaniabgUIiYdGccaGGSaaaaa@452E@ or [ − 1 3 t 3 + 5 2 t 2 −4t ]  1  4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWadaqaaiabgkHiTmaala aabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaiodaaaGaamiDamaaCaaaleqabaGaaG4maaaa kiabgUcaRmaalaaabaGaaGynaaqaaiaaikdaaaGaamiDamaaCaaale qabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgkHiTiaaisdacaWG0baacaGLBbGaayzxaaWa a0baaSqaaiaayIW7caaIXaaabaGaaGjcVlaaisdaaaaaaa@454C@ would earn the second point.

The third point is earned with − 1 3 t 3 + 5 2 t 2 −4t. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaig daaeaacaaIZaaaaiaadshadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaiodaaaGccqGHRaWk daWcaaqaaiaaiwdaaeaacaaIYaaaaiaadshadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaik daaaGccqGHsislcaaI0aGaamiDaiaac6caaaa@3F44@

Simplification is not required for the fourth point.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes three of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all four of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned with an explicit statement connecting g ′  =f . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGNbGbauaacaaMi8Uaey ypa0JaamOzaiaayIW7caGGUaaaaa@39F0@ Note that it is possible that this connection is made in an earlier part and will earn the point here.

The second point is earned for values appearing in an equation, table, or paragraph.

The third point is earned by ruling out all other candidates and committing to the minimum value of 0. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIWaGaaiOlaaaa@34A0@
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned with all three intervals, with or without the endpoints. Verbal expressions rather than intervals also earn the point.

The second point is earned with reasoning clearly tied to the given graph of f. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGMbGaaiOlaaaa@34D1@
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.
